text:
Hi guys, hope everyone is okay :slightly_smiling_face:

Is there a roadmap of upcoming features?

The latest are the custom objects but I would like to have a projection on the other features. I don't know if it's possible

Thank you and have a nice day !

<@U01C7G8GF7E> It can take a little times to have information from some people because we all are in different timezone
If people have information they will answer asap

Yes no worries I'm aware of it
I find that the community is already really active and responds super fast so that's great!

Thank you <@U01DF3PNCKA> :smile:

Staff and community helper make all their best :slightly_smiling_face:
yw
Do you check the community portal for information ?
Maybe someone already ask the same question
Yes but I just find the existing roadmap with the last update (like the custom object) :confused:
Maybe <https://www.HubSpot.com/new|this> is what you are looking for
Is there a way to have multiple user logins to a site? (i.e. Member Login, Vendor Login, Admin Login)
